thread.title: Nicole L.
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Nicole L.

author: Nicole L.
title: Nicole L.
text: I had a great experience at the Springfield, MA location on Boston Rd. I purchased new tires in October and recently brought my mother in for tires. Dan Nieves was beyond helpful and made sure my car was in good hands. I was so happy with his help and my new tires that I brought my mother there when she quickly needed to get new tires. Once again Dan made sure we were in good hands. He had Tito help my mom. She had a set of tires picked out but Tito gave her information on a few other options and she ended up going with his recommendation. These guys are really great and Dan really looks out for his customers.
